identity.title: Creating a List of Words from a File

content.prompt: Construct a program that reads a text file and creates a list of the words that the file contains, ignoring the case of the letters. Assume that all of the words in the text file are separated by a single space characters.

uses.context_name: Java: CMPINF0401 | CMPINF 401 - Intermediate Programming - Fall 2025 - Fully reversed > File processing
